name: mongofilter
description: mongoquery style for standard javascript collections

scripts.build: babel -o dist/commonjs/mongofilter.js js/*.es6 && babel --modules amd -o dist/amd/mongofilter.js js/*.es6 && babel --modules system -o dist/system/mongofilter.js js/*.es6 && babel --modules umd -o dist/umd/mongofilter.js js/*.es6
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/amd/mongofilter.js -mc > dist/amd/mongofilter.min.js && uglifyjs dist/umd/mongofilter.js -mc > dist/umd/mongofilter.min.js && uglifyjs dist/system/mongofilter.js -mc > dist/system/mongofilter.min.js
scripts.banner:
for f in dist/*/*.js; do echo "/*https://github.com/malko/mongofilter brought to you under MIT licence by Jonathan Gotti version: $npm_package_version*/
$(cat $f)" > $f; done
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run minify && npm test

author: Jonathan Gotti
